snippet.title: Longplay of Sonic The Hedgehog (2006) - Very Hard Mode (DLC)
snippet.description:
Longplay of Sonic The Hedgehog - Very Hard Mode (DLC), played as the NTSC version on the Xbox 360. This game's DLC was released on Nov. 14th, 2006. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

00:00 - Wave Ocean
05:28 - White Acropolis
10:51 - Crisis City
17:34 - Dusty Desert
21:14 - Flame Core
27:31 - Radical Train
31:17 - Tropical Jungle
37:12 - Kingdom Valley
46:57 - Aquatic Base

By: PlayablePassion
